summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South, from Court Street to Andover Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8594 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
